summary:
Katja is a simple follower at the moment. That will change in the coming months.
She is custom voiced and has unique dialogue. You can ask her about her past, or about any thoughts she may have.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]﻿Katja Strong-Heart
[/size]The custom-voiced Nordic follower.


Katja is a young girl of about 15. She grew up in Cyrodiil, moving to Skyrim shortly after being born.

[b]She can be found at the Bee and Barb in Riften.
[/b]
